name: What's That Tune?
description:
Special 3rd Anniversary Sale. After tirelessly saving millions from overage, DataMan celebrates with a massive sale party ;) Checkout our DataMan apps now.

Be the largest music head with the largest song collection EVER. Race against time to identify the endless tunes thrown at you. Play Single or Multiplayer for free. Compete with 3 friends or anyone in the world in real-time. Steal time from opponents and trash-talk your way to victory.

・ More than 3,000 songs to play
・ 8 genres to choose from
・ Challenge your friends to a genre
・ Trash-talk with multiplayer Voice Chat
・ Hear the top songs in iTunes
・ Daily updates with new songs
・ Localized to your iTunes Store country
・ Endless game play with Time Bonus
・ Fast-paced crazy quiz for music lovers


Note: To remove auto-match wait time in Multiplayer game, you can invite your Game Center friends to play.
